title: Download VSTS Drop and Run Script
description: Downloads the latest build artifact for a given build definition and then executes a script from that drop.  The download will be in c:\<build definition name>\

vstsProjectUri.description: The URL for the VSTS project that contains the build, eg https://accountName.visualstudio.com/defaultcollection/projectName

buildDefinitionName.description: Name of the build definition to be retrieved

personalAccessToken.description: Personal Access Token for accessing VSTS build

pathToScript.description: Path to Script for execution, eg 'drop\bin\Debug\scriptName.ps1'

scriptArguments.description: Optional arguments for the script, eg '-server localhost'

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy bypass "& ./DownloadVstsDropAndExecuteScript.ps1', ' -accessToken ', parameters('personalAccessToken'), ' -buildDefinitionName ''', parameters('buildDefinitionName'), ''' -vstsProjectUri ''', parameters('vstsProjectUri'), ''' -pathToScript ''', parameters('pathToScript'), ''' -scriptArguments ''', parameters('scriptArguments'), '''"')]
